scalar:array.comment: /** * Smarty Internal Plugin Resource PHP * * Implements the file system as resource for PHP templates * * @package Smarty * @subpackage TemplateResources * @author Uwe Tews * @author Rodney Rehm */

/** * populate Source Object with meta data from Resource * * @param Smarty_Template_Source $source source object * @param Smarty_Internal_Template $_template template object * @return void */
/** * populate Source Object with timestamp and exists from Resource * * @param Smarty_Template_Source $source source object * @return void */

/** * Load template's source from file into current template object * * @param Smarty_Template_Source $source source object * @return string template source * @throws SmartyException if source cannot be loaded */

/** * Render and output the template (without using the compiler) * * @param Smarty_Template_Source $source source object * @param Smarty_Internal_Template $_template template object * @return void * @throws SmartyException if template cannot be loaded or allow_php_templates is disabled */
